data.question: What is BlueLedger?
data.answer: BlueLedger is an open-source showcase application. It is not a real product.

data.question: Is my data safe/private?
data.answer: This is a demo environment, data can and will be wiped without notice. Please avoid uploading sensitive information.

data.question: Are there any limitations?
data.answer: Due to operational costs, some features like AI interactions will be very limited and may become unavailable without notice.

data.question: Do you have all of the mentioned features?
data.answer: No, but we are working on it.

data.question: How do I report a bug or suggest a feature?
data.answer: Open an issue in the repository with steps to reproduce or details about your request.
